item.title: Hello and welcome
item.description: Hello everyone, my name is Leidson Cruz and i’am Software Engineer. Currently i live on Lisbon - Portugal but i’am from Jo√£o Pessoa - Brazil. I lived on Rio de Janeiro for 4 years before move to Lisbon and was a amazing experience.
